sections.text: Transfer of Board of Ethics, State Officers Compensation Commission, and Civil Service Commission to Department of Management and Budget; Transfer of Position of Director of Department of Civil Service as Member of Michigan Women's Commission to State Personnel Director; Transfer of Director of Department of Civil Service as Member of Interagency Council on Spanish-Speaking Affairs to State Personnel Director.
